results.title: Long-term monotherapy with lisinopril in renovascular hypertension.

results.title: Lisinopril: a nonsulfhydryl angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ has been shown to be an effective antihypertensive agent at doses of 10 to 80 mg given once daily in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with essential and secondary @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ caused by @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Noble TA, Murray KM. Lisinopril: a nonsulfhydryl angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor. Clin Pharm. 1988 Sep;7(9):659-69. PMID: 2853660
citations.BibTeX: @article{2853660, title={Lisinopril: a nonsulfhydryl angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor.}, author={Noble TA and Murray KM}, journal={Clin Pharm}, volume={7}, number={9}, pages={659-69}}

results.title: Positron-emission tomography imaging of the angiotensin II subtype 1 receptor in swine renal artery stenosis.
results.text_hl: Both in vivo and in vitro binding measurements showed that the effect of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@ on the AT(1)R was not abolished by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Xia J, Seckin E, Xiang Y, Vranesic M, Mathews WB, Hong K, Bluemke DA, Lerman LO, Szabo Z. Positron-emission tomography imaging of the angiotensin II subtype 1 receptor in swine renal artery stenosis. Hypertension. 2008 Feb;51(2):466-73. PMID: 18172054
citations.BibTeX: @article{18172054, title={Positron-emission tomography imaging of the angiotensin II subtype 1 receptor in swine renal artery stenosis.}, author={Xia J and Seckin E and Xiang Y and Vranesic M and Mathews WB and Hong K and Bluemke DA and Lerman LO and Szabo Z}, journal={Hypertension}, volume={51}, number={2}, pages={466-73}}

results.title: Enalapril and Lisinopril in Renovascular Hypertension Antihypertensne and Hormonal Effects of Two New Angio-Tensin-Converting-Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitors.
results.text_hl: All @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had angiographically verified @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery lesions@@@, 3 had bilateral @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@ and one a stenosis in a single kidney, and the rest had unilateral @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Karlberg BE, Fyhrquist F, Grönhagen-Riska C, Tikkanen I, Öhman KP. Enalapril and Lisinopril in Renovascular Hypertension Antihypertensne and Hormonal Effects of Two New Angio-Tensin-Converting-Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitors. Scand J Urol Nephrol. 1984 Jul;18(sup79):103-106. PMID: 27786014

results.title: Enalapril and lisinopril in renovascular hypertension--antihypertensive and hormonal effects of two new angiotensin-converting-enzyme (ACE) inhibitors. A preliminary report.
results.text_hl: All @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had angiographically verified @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery lesions@@@, 3 had bilateral @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@ and one a stenosis in a single kidney, and the rest had unilateral @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery stenosis@@@.

results.title: Antihypertensive and hormonal effects of lisinopril, a new angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor in patients with renovascular hypertension.
results.text_hl: The antihypertensive and hormonal effects of a new ACE-inhibitor, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@MK-521@@@), was studied in 11 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal arterial stenosis@@@ (bilateral in 1).

citations.NLM: Karlberg BE, Rosenqvist U. Antihypertensive and hormonal effects of lisinopril, a new angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor in patients with renovascular hypertension. Acta Med Scand Suppl. 1986;714():33-42. PMID: 3033998
citations.BibTeX: @article{3033998, title={Antihypertensive and hormonal effects of lisinopril, a new angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor in patients with renovascular hypertension.}, author={Karlberg BE and Rosenqvist U}, journal={Acta Med Scand Suppl}, volume={714}, pages={33-42}}

results.title: Renal endothelial function is associated with the anti-proteinuric effect of ACE inhibition in 5/6 nephrectomized rats.
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Acetylcholine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000109 @@@acetylcholine@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal artery dilation@@@ at baseline negatively correlated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-induced reduction of @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ (r(2) = 0.648, P = 0.003) and with the decrease in SBP (r(2) = 0.592, P = 0.006).

citations.NLM: Vettoretti S, Vavrinec P, Ochodnicky P, Deelman LE, De Zeeuw D, Henning RH, Buikema H. Renal endothelial function is associated with the anti-proteinuric effect of ACE inhibition in 5/6 nephrectomized rats. Am J Physiol Renal Physiol. 2016 May 1;310(10):F1047-53. PMID: 26911850
citations.BibTeX: @article{26911850, title={Renal endothelial function is associated with the anti-proteinuric effect of ACE inhibition in 5/6 nephrectomized rats.}, author={Vettoretti S and Vavrinec P and Ochodnicky P and Deelman LE and De Zeeuw D and Henning RH and Buikema H}, journal={Am J Physiol Renal Physiol}, volume={310}, number={10}, pages={F1047-53}}

results.title: A transplanted kidney surviving total vessel occlusion and anuria.
results.text_hl: We report a case of a 46-year-old white male with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@renal graft artery stenosis@@@ who developed @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute renal shutdown@@@ with total @DISEASE_Anuria @DISEASE_MESH:D001002 @@@anuria@@@ while on the ACE inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, one week following the discontinuation of @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@.

citations.NLM: El-Harakeh MA, Barbari A, Stephan A, Saggi S, Kilany H, Barakeh A. A transplanted kidney surviving total vessel occlusion and anuria. Clin Nephrol. 2005 Aug;64(2):159-62. PMID: 16114794
citations.BibTeX: @article{16114794, title={A transplanted kidney surviving total vessel occlusion and anuria.}, author={El-Harakeh MA and Barbari A and Stephan A and Saggi S and Kilany H and Barakeh A}, journal={Clin Nephrol}, volume={64}, number={2}, pages={159-62}}
